name: Audi R8RacerToCP
description: The objective of this game is to crash your Audi R8 racer into as many obstacles as possible (the yellow cube stacks and the ramps are both fun for this), until you get tired of it; then use the button to send your score to an Adobe Captivate demo on a remote web server.  The CP demo will have launched your game in the first place. This is simply a demonstration of Unity/Cp integration.
